videoSnippet.title: With Mistake Comes Brilliancy || Nepo vs Mamedyarov || St. Louis (2022)
videoSnippet.description:
Photo by Lennart Ootes!

Evans Gambit tutorial by me here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CUQQ4dym5ZU

Article and video here https://www.chess.com/news/view/chesscom-playmagnus

Have a great day :)

Nepomniachtchi, Ian (2792) - Mamedyarov, Shakhriyar (2758) 1-0
Saint Louis Rapid & Blitz (chess24.com) [4] 2022.08.27
E10 Queen's pawn game

1.d4 Nf6 2.c4 e6 3.Nf3 d5 4.g3 Bb4+ 5.Bd2 Be7 6.Bg2 O-O 7.O-O Nbd7 8.Qc2 c6 9.h4 b6 10.Nc3 Ba6 11.cxd5 cxd5 12.Rfc1 Bb7 13.Bf4 Rc8 14.Qb3 a6 15.a4 h6 16.e3 Nh5 17.Bh3 Rc4 18.Qd1 Nxf4 19.exf4 Bd6 20.Bf1 Rc7 21.Bd3 Nf6 22.Qe2 Qa8 23.Ne5 Rfc8 24.f3 h5 25.Qe3 Bb4 26.Rc2 g6 27.Rac1 Kg7 28.Bxg6 fxg6 29.Qd3 Ne4 30.fxe4 dxe4 31.Qe3 Bd5 32.g4 hxg4 33.Rg2 Kh7 34.Rxg4 Rg8 35.Kh2 Qc8 36.f5 gxf5 37.Rxg8 Kxg8 38.Qg5+ Rg7 39.Nxd5

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:43 Game Starts!
02:10 Completely New Game!
08:00 Pause the Video!
12:15 It Was In This Position!
13:58 Contributions!

The Saint Louis Rapid & Blitz is the 4th stage on the 2022 Grand Chess Tour, a series of five events with a total prize fund of $1.4 million. The 10-player event takes place from August 26-31 and has a $40,000 top prize.

The rapid is a single round-robin on the first 3 days with a time control of 25 minutes for all moves and a 10-second increment from move 1. The final 2 days are a blitz double round-robin, with 18 rounds of 5+2 blitz. Rapid games count double, with 2 points for a win and 1 for a draw. Official website: grandchesstour.org
